headline: Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX) on Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BSX. Boston Scientific Corporation (BSX)’s share was trading at $94.27 as of April 14th. BSX’s trailing and forward P/E were 75.42 and 33.11 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
